Posts.Content: AnneMarieV wrote: My doctors told me it's ok to keep my hormonal IUD (not mirena but a 3 year lighter version) during chemo. I have hormone negative, HER2 positive breast cancer. I'm just wondering if anyone had theirs taken out on dr reco, or had any side effects from it being in during chemo, because I'm paranoid. :) I'm doing 4x ac followed by 12 weekstaxol, herceptin and perjeta. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Hormonal IUD during chemo AnneMarieV VickiRides

Posts.Content: Jun 4, 2016 06:26AM AnneMarieV wrote: I lost my hair completely during AC but 3 weeks after my last AC it started growing back. I have lost my eyelashes and eyebrows on weekly taxol, but the hair on my head has come back. It is not fuzz it's real hair just thin! I have completed 11 and have one more treatment to go.
Posts.Title: Hair regrowth after DD Taxol sweetbean Byhisstripes419
